data.meta_description: Everyday, approximately 800 women across the world die from preventable complications due to pregnancy.

Merck for Mothers Reaches More than 30 Million Women Worldwide

We have surpassed our goal of reaching 25 million women by 2025 through our efforts promoting safe, high-quality, respectful maternal health care.
